sentences.en: After recharging is completed. pull the shaver out of the AC outlet.
sentences.cn: 充电结束以后.从交流输出插座拔出电动剃须刀.

sentences.en: Do place a shaving mirror close to the shaver socket.
sentences.cn: 在剃须刀插座边上装一面放大镜.

sentences.en: Given an overly sharp razor blade, the shaver often cuts himself.
sentences.cn: 技术冲突可以描述为:当我用锋利的刀片剃须的时候, 割伤了自己.

sentences.en: Hey, Bob. I can't find my electric shaver.
sentences.cn: 喂, 鲍勃, 我怎么找不到我的电动剃须刀?

sentences.en: I want to buy an electric shaver.

sentences.en: Shaver even claimed to have dwelled with the inner Earth people.

sentences.en: Use electric shaver instead of a razor.
sentences.cn: 不要使用刀片,使用电动剃须刀.
